Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the county of Niagara to continue to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Authorizes the county of Niagara to continue to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the county of Niagara to continue to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use taxes
